code documentation¶

class moore_braidgenerator.markovchain.MarkovChain(**kwargs)¶

MarkovChain is an encapsulation of the Markov Chain. It takes a BraidWord and allows modelling, which creates a specified number of isomorphs along with the logs pertaining to that isomorph (i.e. which Markov Move was made at some iteration).

Parameters
braidwordBraidWord

A BraidWord to have isomorphs generated from it. Note that a simple Python list can be given as a parameter as well, which will be converted to a BraidWord behind the scenes.

maxgenint

The maximum absolute value a generator can be in the BraidWord and its subsequent isomorphisms.

maxlenint

The maxmimum length of that any subsequent isomorphs can reach.

Attributes
braidaggdictionary

Dictionary that holds isomorphs and logs.

Examples

>>> mc = MarkovChain(braidword=[1, 2, 3], maxgen=9, maxlen=10)

>>> mc.braid.word
        [1, 2, 3]

>>> mc.maxgen
9

>>> mc.maxlen
10
aggregate()¶

Method to return a dictionary of MarkovChain instance’s isomorphs and logs, both contained in their respective lists. That is, returns self.braidagg.

clear_model()¶

Method to clear braid instance. That is, it clears braidagg.

isomorphs(as_word=False)¶

Method to return MarkovChain instance isomorphs in a list.

Parameters
as_wordbool

Determines if isomorphs should be returned as words or BraidWords.

Returns

If True returns isomorphs as words (list). Otherwise returns them as BraidWords (of class BraidWord).

static log_message(movetype: int, name: str, result: bool) → str¶

Function to dynamically create log of Markov Move @[mstep]

Parameters

  • movetype (int) – Markov Move[i] for i in [0, 6], inclusive. There are 7 Markov Moves that determine the braid-to-isomorph modification.

  • name (str) – The name of the Markov Move.

  • result (bool) – Boolean representing whether the move was successfully executed or not.

Returns

String of log for BraidWord.word at Markov Move [i] for i in [0, 6], inclusive.

logs()¶

Method to return MarkovChain instance logs in a list. Note that the length of the list is equal to the number of isomorphisms requested in the num_isomorphs argument of model. Each log represents the logs undergone to create a specific isomorphism and is held in a dictionary. The size of the dictionary is equal to the argument passed for msteps in model.

model(num_isomorphs: int = 1, msteps: int = 100)¶

Method to model the BraidWord and generate isomorphs and logs. A random number is picked between (0, 6), inclusive, determining the Markov Move to perform. Another random number is picked from range(len(BraidWord.word)) that represents the index of BraidWord.word to perform the Markov Move on. The isomorph is generated by picking a random index from the set of possible indices for BraidWord.word and a random Markov Move that acts on BraidWord.word at the given index.

Parameters
num_isomorphsint

Number of isomorphs to be modeled from the BraidWord given to the Markov Chain.

mstepsint

The number of steps to be taken until an isomorph is considered to be complete. That is, msteps many iterations of the model process take place on a given BraidWord.

Returns

Appends isomorph and log to self.braidagg.

new_braidword()¶

Method to set a new BraidWord.

Parameters
braidwordBraidWord

The new BraidWord to replace the old BraidWord.

Returns

Replaces self.braid with braidword.

tocsv(path_or_filename='', only_isomorphs=False)¶

Method to export logs, isomorphs to csv. If path_or_filename not given, will export the csv to current directory with the name Isomorphs.csv or Isomorphs_and_Logs.csv. The name is implicitly determined by the parameter passed to only_isomorphs.

Parameters
path_or_filenamestr

Path or filename to store csv.

only_isomorphsbool

Determines if only isomorphs should be returned or both isomorphs and logs.

Returns

A csv file containing a dataframe with either only isomorphs or both isomorphs and logs, depending on parameter passed to only_isomorphs.

topandas(only_isomorphs=False)¶

Method to export logs, isomorphs to pandas df.

Parameters
only_isomorphsbool

Determines if only isomorphs should be returned or both isomorphs and logs.

Returns

If only_isomorphs=True returns a pandas dataframe of only isomorphs. Otherwise will return a pandas dataframe with both isomorphs and logs.

totxt(path_or_filename='', only_isomorphs=False)¶

Method to export logs, isomorphs to a txt file. If path_or_filename not given, will export the csv to current directory with the name Isomorphs.txt or Isomorphs_and_Logs.txt. The name is implicitly determined by the parameter passed to only_isomorphs.

Note

The format in the .txt is vertical, as follows:

isomorph[1]

…

isomorph[n]

(newline)

log[1]

…

log[n]

Parameters
path_or_filenamestr

Path or filename to store txt.

only_isomorphsbool

Determines if only isomorphs should be returned or both isomorphs and logs.

Returns

A txt file containing a either only isomorphs or both isomorphs and logs, depending on parameter passed to only_isomorphs.

class moore_braidgenerator.braidword.BraidWord(**kwargs)¶

Encapsulation of a mathematical braid. BraidWord contains a word which consists of a list of generators and is a component to be used in the MarkovChain.

Parameters

initword (list) – List containing generators to be used as initial word.

word¶

word of BraidWord, made up of list containing integer generators.

Type

list

largestGenerator¶

Largest generator in word.

Type

int

genCount¶

Array of quantity of generators in word.

Type

list

canCancel(index) → bool¶

Boolean stating if cancel at index is a valid move.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where canCancel is to be checked.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

canDestabilize() → bool¶

Returns a boolean stating if self.destabilize() is a valid move. For consistent Markov probabilities we only consider search for largestGenerator to exist at the end of word.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

canFlip(index: int) → bool¶

Boolean stating if flip at index is a valid move.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where canFlip is to be checked.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

canTranspose(index) → bool¶

Boolean stating if transpose at index is a valid move.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where canTranspose is to be checked.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

cancel(index) → bool¶

Performs a cancelation of the generators at index and (index+1)%length and decreases self.length by 2. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where cancel is to be performed.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

conjugate(index) → bool¶

Conjugate the word by amount. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where conjugate is to be performed.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

destabilize() → bool¶

Destabilize the braid word and decrease self.length by 1, and possibly decrease self.largestGenerator. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

flip(index: int) → bool¶

Flips generators at index, (index+1)%length, and (index+2)%length. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where flip is to be performed.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

insert(index, generator) → bool¶

Insert a generator and its inverse into word. Will insert the given generator and its inverse at index and increases self.length by 2. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

  • index (int) – Index where cancel is to be performed.

  • generator (int) – Generator to insert into word.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

length() → int¶

Dynamically returns the length of the word.

Returns

Return type

Length of the word.

stabilize() → bool¶

Stabilize the braid word, increase self.length by 1, and increase self.largestGenerator. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

transpose(index) → bool¶

Transposes generators at index and (index+1)%length. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where transpose is to be performed.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.
